thread.title: London Bank (Tower) -
thread.title_full: London Bank (Tower) - Review of Premier Inn London Bank (Tower) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ronald W
title: London Bank (Tower) -
text: Welcoming staff, front office and restaurant. Comfortable, quiet room, very clean and typical comfortable bed at Premier Inn. Excellent location for central London and further afield. Food good, but the dinner menu could be more adventurous but good value through the meal deal.
